projectItems.name: Shopping Cart
projectItems.info: This responsive project includes fully functioning shopping cart implemented using React Context API.
features: Add and remove items to the cart
View, update, close the cart modal
Show active state of the cart
Display the number of items in the card on a badge
Mobile responsive

projectItems.name: Movie App
projectItems.info: Fetching external API, this project displays popular movies and information along with search function.
features: Display popular movies
Display movie information
Search for movies
Mobile responsive

projectItems.name: Huddle
projectItems.info: A clone project to practice rendering UI using React and Styled Components.
features: Mobile responsive

projectItems.name: Calculator
features: Basic arithmetic functions like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
Keyboard input support
Clear screen
Delete the last single input

projectItems.name: Library
projectItems.info: This project showcases JavaScript CRUD operation.
features: Add and delete book item
Keep track of book title, author, pages, and whether or not the book has been read
Saves information on the local storage

projectItems.name: Etch a Sketch
projectItems.info: A web-browser version of something between sketchpad and an Etch-A-Sketch developed using JavaScript DOM manipulation and CSS grid.
features: 1 Color Mode sketches on mouse over with a single default colour
Random Mode sketches on mouse over with 5 different colours chosen randomely
Shake button deletes the sketch and resets the grid to the selected grid size
Small Pixel button creates a grid of 32 X 32
Medium Pixel button creates a grid of 16 X 16
Large Pixel button creates a grid of 8 X 8

skillsItems.title: Network Security
contents: Cisco Certified Network Associate Routing and Switching
